name: " Puck Fepsi " - POP ART by HP LoveBux
description:
This is a limited edition piece of topical POP ART. "PUCK FEPSI" by HP LoveBux.

As we have created a robust crypto art space where indie artists grew develop and collaborate building wealth and self-made financial agency... mega-corporations would love to come in and scoop all of that 'value' and 'goodwill' right back into their own top-down control structures. 

This funny character is a satire of their recent "mic drop" NFT announcement, in which they are trying to position themelves as if they are an artist having a 'genesis' collection, rather than a mutlinational corporation with an appalling track record of cultural and environmental damages and tremendous human cost. 

No PEPSICO. I do not welcome you to this space. If you were an politician or goverment, people would be ashamed to be photographed with you. 

So here is my MIC DROP. 100 editions ... will burn after 24 hours. This will be rare. 

HP LoveBux
